title: Can my TalkBand B2 record my fitness statistics while I use it as a Bluetooth headset?
answer:
Yes. Your TalkBand B2 can count your steps while you are using the Bluetooth headset. Place the Bluetooth headset back into the strap when you do not need it to avoid dropping it. 

 (Note: Your TalkBand B2 cannot record your cycling and stair climbing statistics while you use it as a Bluetooth headset.)
